OrgName.entry: COUNTY OF SHEFFIELD GUIDE ASSOCIATION, THE

Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides a wide range of leisure time activities with an underlying educational purpose aiming to develop a self-reliant and self-disciplined person with a desire to use what has been learnt in the service of others. Open to any girl or woman who is prepared to make the Guide Promise.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
